The user throws a Bō staff at the enemy and increases their number for an effective attack. The technique does not require the use of additional weapons, since the shadow clones are not illusory, but have a real threat of injury.  Taking into account the instant appearance of copies of thrown weapons, it will be quite difficult for the enemy to reflect the attack.
